posts.title: Front-End
posts.content: A front-end developer is a software professional who designs and builds the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) of websites and web applications

posts.title: Java Developer
posts.content: A Java Developer is a specialized programmer who work on business applications, software, and websites along with software engineers and web developers. Java developer can work in following two domains:

posts.title: Python Devloper
posts.content: A Python developer is a professional who works with the Python programming language to build websites, applications, and other software. They often work on the server side of a project, writing logic and developing platforms.
